docinfo.macro:
Click anywhere inside this page to compromise your system!
Don't worry. Only a harmless batch file will be run. View the source if you dont believe me ;)
Like I said in my Internet Explorer Auto-SP2 RC analysis, nothing is perfect. Breaking something, or if you're the hacker, building something, only requires patience and a little bit of spare time.

Greetz to Mikx, Michael Evanchik, and the entire Mozilla team. This is a very nice browser you guys have put together!
